dungeons_iso.config.title: Isometric Dungeons
dungeons_iso.config.scrollWheelZoom.name: Scroll wheel zoom
dungeons_iso.config.scrollWheelZoom.desc: Zoom with scroll wheel (overrides hotbar scrolling).
dungeons_iso.config.movementCameraRelati: Make movement work relative to the camera instead of the player.
dungeons_iso.config.lockOnTargeting.name: Lock-on targeting
dungeons_iso.config.lockOnTargeting.desc: Cycle through mobs with a keybind. Locked-on mobs override cursor targeting.
Toggles if this feature is allowed on the server.
dungeons_iso.config.capabilities:
Additional features that aren't vanilla server friendly.
Â§eThese must be allowed by the server operator. On local worlds, commands must be enabled.
dungeons_iso.config.targetFromCamera.des: Pick target from cursor position, bypassing player line of sight.
dungeons_iso.config.unlimitedReach.name: Unlimited reach
dungeons_iso.config.unlimitedReach.descr: Allow interaction with blocks no matter how far from the player they are.
